title: Hong Kong Extends Invitation to Coinbase and Crypto Companies Amid Regulatory Scrutiny
description: In the midst of heightened regulatory scrutiny on the crypto market ecosystem in the United States, Hong Kong Legislative Council member Johnny Ng has extended an open invitation to global virtual asset trading operators, including Coinbase, to set up shop in the region.  This move comes as the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) targets ... Read more
